com.ca.codesv.protocols.http.fluent

Interface HttpRequestMessageBuilder<T extends HttpRequestMessageBuilder>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpRequestVerificationBuilder, HttpTransactionBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHttpRequestMessageBuilder, AbstractHttpRequestVerificationBuilder, AbstractHttpTransactionBuilder, HttpRequestMessageBuilderImpl, HttpRequestVerificationBuilderImpl, HttpTransactionBuilderImpl

    public interface HttpRequestMessageBuilder<T extends HttpRequestMessageBuilder>
    HTTP Request message builder interface.
